projects.title: U&I Store
projects.shortDescription: Ecommerce Application for Sketching Related Products
projects.description: Created this app in MERN stack, used own component library for CSS. Core features include Cart and Wishlist Management, PayPal sandboxing for payment, apply coupon feature, address management, search/filter/sort functionality, JWT based Authentication

projects.title: U&I Talks
projects.shortDescription: A Social Media App to Post Learnings
projects.description: Created this app in MERN stack, used Redux Toolkit for state management, Chakra UI for CSS, Cloudinary for image upload. Core features include Create post with text and image, Posting shared content, Post Feed, Search User, Notification Management, Follow/Unfollow Users, Like Post, Update User Profile and profile image, JWT based Authentication

projects.title: U&I Quiz
projects.shortDescription: Fun Quiz app based on Sketching
projects.description: Created this app in MERN stack, used TypeScript with React, Chakra UI for CSS, Unit tests in JEST. Core features include Multiple Quizzes, Score at the end of the Quiz play, Review answers feature, Personal dashboard for attempted quizzes using Local Storage, JWT based Authentication

projects.title: U&I Video Library
projects.description: Created this app in MERN stack, used own component library for CSS. Core features include Search video, Filter by category, Playlist Management, Notes Management, Learning History, Share video to U&I talks, JWT based Authentication

projects.title: U&I â€“ Component Library to build UI faster
projects.description: Created component library in HTML, Vanilla CSS and Vanilla JS. It has 15 Reusable components with different variations of each component. Each component supports dark theme and light theme. Most of the components have live demo examples.

projects.title: Keep Notes
projects.description: App is created in React JS. Tried to create a clone of Google keep app.

projects.title: Blog Listing App
projects.description: App is created in React JS. Used dev.to api to fetch blogs. Added a search functionality to search blogs.

projects.title: Birthdate Palindrome Check
projects.description: Created an app in React-JS to check if entered birthdate is Palindrome. If it is not palindrome, then it will show nearest palindrome date and by how many days it got missed.

projects.title: Fun with triangles
projects.description: Created an app in Vanilla JS to make learning about triangles fun.

projects.title: Cash Register Manager
projects.description: Created app using React-JS and Vanilla-JS. User can enter the bill amount and cash given by the customer and know minimum number of notes to return.

projects.title: Stock Returns Calculator
projects.description: This app is created using vanilla js which shows how much profit or loss we are having on our stocks. If user has gained more than 50%, it makes the theme of app happy and if user has lost more than 50%, it makes the theme of app sad

projects.title: Is your birthdate Lucky?
projects.description: Created this app using React-JS and Vanilla-JS, which tells if birthdate is lucky or not.

projects.title: Best Web Series
projects.description: This is a fun app to check best series of listed genres. This app is created using React-js.

projects.title: Fun with Flags
projects.description: This is a fun app to check flags' country by searching or clicking on listed flags on the page. Created with React-JS.

projects.title: Talk Like Pirates
projects.description: This is a translation app to convert English to Pirates language. Check this app to talk like Pirates with your friends.

projects.title: Talk Like Minions
projects.description: This is a translation app to convert english to banana language. Minions speak in banana language in Animated movie Despicable me. This is a fun game to talk like minions in friends.

projects.title: Slideshow
projects.description: I have created a slideshow using React-JS and Vanilla-JS. We can show image and text in a slide. On clicking on arrows, slides get scrolled.

projects.title: Were you born in a leap year?(React Js)
projects.description: This a small fun game, to check if user were born in a leap year. This app is created using React-JS.

projects.title: Were you born in a leap year?(Vanilla JS)
projects.description: This a small fun game, to check if user were born in a leap year. This app is created using Vanilla-JS.

projects.title: Were you born in a leap year?
projects.description: This a small fun game, to check if user were born in a leap year. This is a CLI app created using Javascript. hosted using repl.it.

projects.title: Is your birth date a prime number?
projects.description: A CLI app built with nodeJS. A small fun game, to check if birth date of user is a prime number.

projects.title: Are you a harry potter fan?
projects.description: A CLI app built with nodeJS. A small fun game, you can send this to your friends and find out who is the biggest fan of Harry Potter

projects.title: How well do you know me?
projects.description: A CLI app built with nodeJS. You can send this to your friends and find out who knows you better
